name: Under Stranger Stars
description:
Under Stranger Stars is the story of one man ruining the entire universe armed with nothing but a small spaceship, a moderately homicidal AI and an absurd variety of guns. Inspired by The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy, Sunless Sea and that one time the developer got a parking fine, Under Stranger Stars is a game of adventure and absurdity.



Discover an open world filled with stories, spaceports and enemies ready for you to uncover, investigate, and murder. Assassinate bounties, take on Dreadnoughts and hunt down mega-freighters.
